languages.text: "Он боялся не нас. Он не знал нас — лишь догадывался — его мысленные процессы занимала техночума. Ее он боялся. От нее хотел защиты".
"It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."
languages.original_text: "Он боялся не нас. Он не знал нас — лишь догадывался — его мысленные процессы занимала техночума. Ее он боялся. От нее хотел защиты".

traits.locale_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «No nos temía a nosotros. No sabía que existíamos, pero lo sospechaba. Sus procesos mentales estaban centrados en la tecnoplaga. Eso era lo que temía. Quería protegerse de ella».
languages.original_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."

traits.locale_text: «No nos temía a nosotros. No sabía que existíamos, pero lo sospechaba. Sus procesos mentales estaban centrados en la tecnoplaga. Eso era lo que temía. Quería protegerse de ella».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「彼は我々を恐れたのではない。彼は我々を知らなかった。彼の精神回路はテック・ブライトに侵されていた。彼はそれを恐れた。病から自分の身を守ろうとした」
languages.original_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は我々を恐れたのではない。彼は我々を知らなかった。彼の精神回路はテック・ブライトに侵されていた。彼はそれを恐れた。病から自分の身を守ろうとした」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “他害怕的不是我们。他不了解我们，只能怀疑我们。他的思维进程被技术枯萎病影响了，这才是他所害怕的事情。他需要保护。”
languages.original_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."

traits.locale_text: “他害怕的不是我们。他不了解我们，只能怀疑我们。他的思维进程被技术枯萎病影响了，这才是他所害怕的事情。他需要保护。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas nous qu'il craignait. Il ne nous connaissait pas. Il ne pouvait que soupçonner la vérité. Ses processus mentaux étaient occupés par la technopeste. Voilà ce qu'il craignait. Voilà ce dont il cherchait à se protéger. »
languages.original_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas nous qu'il craignait. Il ne nous connaissait pas. Il ne pouvait que soupçonner la vérité. Ses processus mentaux étaient occupés par la technopeste. Voilà ce qu'il craignait. Voilà ce dont il cherchait à se protéger. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Nicht vor uns hatte er Angst. Er kannte uns nicht, er vermutete nur. Seine mentalen Prozesse waren von der Tech-Seuche besetzt. Das war es, wovor er Angst hatte. Davor wollte er sich schützen."
languages.original_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht vor uns hatte er Angst. Er kannte uns nicht, er vermutete nur. Seine mentalen Prozesse waren von der Tech-Seuche besetzt. Das war es, wovor er Angst hatte. Davor wollte er sich schützen."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Bizden korkmuyordu. Bizden habersizdi, yalnızca şüpheleri vardı. Akli işlevlerini tekno afeti meşgul ediyordu. Korktuğu da buydu. Bundan korunmak istiyordu."
languages.original_text: "It was not us he feared. He did not know us, but only suspected. His mental processes were occupied by the tech-blight. That was what he feared. He wanted protection from it."

traits.locale_text: "Bizden korkmuyordu. Bizden habersizdi, yalnızca şüpheleri vardı. Akli işlevlerini tekno afeti meşgul ediyordu. Korktuğu da buydu. Bundan korunmak istiyordu."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
